com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core.filter

Interface ILPLocationFilterFactory


  • public interface ILPLocationFilterFactory
    A location filter factory provides filters that operate on locations.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILPFilter getAllFilter()
      Returns a filter that accepts all locations.
      ILPFilter getAllowsCheckInFilter()
      Returns a filter that accepts only those locations for which check-in has been enabled.
      ILPFilter getDeviceIsInFilter()
      Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that the device is currently in according to the Location Marketing server.
      ILPFilter getHasTagFilter(String tag)
      Returns a filter that accepts only those locations with the given tag.
      ILPFilter getWithinDistanceFilter(int distance)
      Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that are within the given distance from the last known geopoint of the device.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllFilter

        ILPFilter getAllFilter()
        Returns a filter that accepts all locations.
        Returns:
        a filter that accepts all locations

      • getAllowsCheckInFilter

        ILPFilter getAllowsCheckInFilter()
        Returns a filter that accepts only those locations for which check-in has been enabled.
        Returns:
        a filter that accepts only those locations for which check-in has been enabled

      • getHasTagFilter

        ILPFilter getHasTagFilter(String tag)
        Returns a filter that accepts only those locations with the given tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag that must be present on the locations accepted by the returned filter
        Returns:
        a filter that accepts only those locations with the given tag
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given tag is null

      • getWithinDistanceFilter

        ILPFilter getWithinDistanceFilter(int distance)
        Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that are within the given distance from the last known geopoint of the device.
        Parameters:
        distance - the maximum distance a location can be from the last known geopoint and still be accepted by the returned filter, in meters
        Returns:
        a filter that accepts only those locations that are within the given distance from the last known geopoint of the device

      • getDeviceIsInFilter

        ILPFilter getDeviceIsInFilter()
        Returns a filter that accepts only those locations that the device is currently in according to the Location Marketing server.
        Returns:
        a filter that accepts only those locations that the device is currently located in according to the Location Marketing server
